\section{Ergo Modifiers Validation}

This section describes all consensus-critical validation rules, that should be performed by every node in the network.


% DON'T EDIT THIS TABLE.
% it is auto-generated by org.ergoplatform.tools.ValidationRulesPrinter

\begin{tabular}{ |p{1.0cm}||p{7.5cm}|p{1.0cm}|p{2.5cm}| }
    \hline
    Id & Validation rule & Active & Modifiers \\
    \hline
    100 & Transaction should have at least one input.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    101 & Transaction should have at least one output.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    102 & Number of transaction inputs should not exceed 32767.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    103 & Number of transaction outputs should not exceed 32767.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    104 & Amounts of transaction outputs should not be negative.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    105 & Sum of transaction outputs should not exceed 9223372036854775807.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    106 & Number of assets in one box should not exceed 255, amount of every individual asset should be positive and sum of assets of one type shouldnot exceed 9223372036854775807.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    120 & Total cost of transaction scripts should not exceed <maxBlockCost>.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    121 & Every output of the transaction should contain at least <minValuePerByte * outputSize> nanoErg.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    122 & Every output of the transaction should have creationHeight less or equals than height of block with this transaction.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    123 & Every input of the transaction should be present in UTXO.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    124 & Every data input of the transaction should be present in UTXO.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    125 & Sum of transaction inputs should not exceed 9223372036854775807.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    126 & Amount of Erg in inputs should equal to amount of Erg in outputs.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    127 & For every token, its amount in inputs should not exceed its amount of Erg in outputs.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    129 & Scripts of all transaction inputs should pass verification.  & true & ErgoTransaction \\
    \hline
    200 & Genesis header should have genesis parent id.  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    201 & Genesis header id should equals to to id from the config.  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    202 & Genesis header may be only applied to empty history.  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    203 & Genesis height should be 1.  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    204 & Header should contain 3 votes, with no duplicates and contradictory votes, that should be known by parametersDescs.  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    206 & Block timestamp should be greater than parents.  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    207 & Header height  should be greater by 1 than parents.  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    208 & Header should contain correct PoW solution:  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    209 & Header should contain correct required difficulty:  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    210 & Header height should not be older, than current height minus <config.keepVersions>.  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    211 & Parent header should not be marked as invalid:  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    212 & Header timestamp should not be more than 20 minutes in future:  & true & Header \\
    \hline
    300 & Modifier  is already in history & true & Header, ADProofs, Extension, BlockTransactions \\
    \hline
    302 & Modifier does not corresponds to header:  & true & ADProofs, Extension, BlockTransactions \\
    \hline
    303 & Header  is semantically invalid:  & true & ADProofs, Extension, BlockTransactions \\
    \hline
    305 & Too old block section:  & true & ADProofs, Extension, BlockTransactions \\
    \hline
    311 & Interlinks should be packed properly.  & true & Extension \\
    \hline
    312 & Interlinks should have correct structure.  & true & Extension \\
    \hline
    313 & Extension fields key length should be 2.  & true & Extension \\
    \hline
    314 & Extension field value length > 64.  & true & Extension \\
    \hline
    315 & Extension should not contain duplicate keys.  & true & Extension \\
    \hline
    316 & Extension of non-genesis block should not be empty.  & true & Extension \\
    \hline
\end{tabular}
